|vo_04_03_tx_s       = 看样子，差不多已经对咖啡免疫了。如果有什么替代品的话…问问丽莎好了。

|vo_05_01_title_s    = 关于琴自己…
|vo_05_01_title_t    = 關於琴自己…
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx_s       = 今天为了保护民众，把五座遗迹守卫斩成了碎片。唉，我还需要继续磨练自己…这么珍贵的文化遗产，下次应该尝试空手制服…
|vo_05_01_tx_t       = 今天為了保護民眾，把五座遺蹟守衛斬成了碎片。唉，我還需要繼續磨練自己…這麼珍貴的文化遺產，下次應該嘗試空手制伏…
|vo_05_01_rm_s       = Jīntiān wèile bǎohù mínzhòng, bǎ wǔ zuò Yíjì Shǒuwèi zhǎnchéngle suìpiàn. Ai, wǒ hái xūyào jìxù móliàn zìjǐ... Zhème zhēnguì de wénhuà yíchǎn, xiàcì yīnggāi chángshì kōngshǒu zhìfú...
|vo_05_01_rm_t       = Jīntiān wèile bǎohù mínzhòng, bǎ wǔ zuò Yíjī Shǒuwèi zhǎnchéngle suìpiàn. Ai, wǒ hái xūyào jìxù móliàn zìjǐ... Zhème zhēnguì de wénhuà yíchǎn, xiàcì yīnggāi chángshì kōngshǒu zhìfú...
|vo_05_01_tl         = Today, to protect the citizens, [I] cut down five Ruin Guards into scattered pieces. Sigh, I still need to train and refine myself... Such valuable cultural artifacts, next time I should try to subdue them empty-handed...

|vo_06_01_title_s    = 关于我们・信条
|vo_06_01_title_t    = 關於我們・信條
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Creed
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Creed.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx_s       = 我会全力帮助你，当然，如果你的方向偏离了正义，我也会毫不犹豫地指出。
|vo_06_01_tx_t       = 我會全力幫助(你/妳)，當然，如果(你/妳)的方向偏離了正義，我也會毫不猶豫地指出。
|vo_06_01_rm         = Wǒ huì quánlì bāngzhù nǐ, dāngrán, rúguǒ nǐ de fāngxiàng piānlíle zhèngyì, wǒ yě huì háobù yóuyù de zhǐchū.
|vo_06_01_tl         = I will do my very best to help you. Of course, should you begin to stray from justice, I will also point it out without hesitation.

|vo_06_02_title_s    = 关于我们・誓言
|vo_06_02_title_t    = 關於我們・誓言
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Oath
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Oath.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx_s       = 我以此剑起誓，必将胜利献给你。
|vo_06_02_tx_t       = 我以此劍起誓，必將勝利獻給(你/妳)。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Wǒ yǐ cǐjiàn qǐshì, bìjiāng shènglì xiàn'gěi nǐ.
|vo_06_02_tl         = I swear by this sword, I will grant you victory.

|vo_06_03_title_s    = 关于我们・任务
|vo_06_03_title_t    = 關於我們・任務
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Quest
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Quest.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx_s       = 任务可是不会自动完成的，但适当放松一下也好。今天就破例午休几分钟吧。
|vo_06_03_tx_t       = 任務可是不會自動完成的，但適當放鬆一下也好。今天就破例午休幾分鐘吧。
|vo_06_03_rm         = Rènwù kěshì bù huì zìdòng wánchéng de, dàn shìdàng fàngsōng yīxià yě hǎo. Jīntiān jiù pòlì wǔxiū jǐ fēnzhōng ba.
|vo_06_03_tl         = Tasks won't be completed on their own, but it's also good to relax appropriately once in a while. Today, let's break routine and have a few minutes of afternoon's rest.

|vo_07_01_title_s    = 关于「神之眼」…
|vo_07_01_title_t    = 關於「神之眼」…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx_s       = 「永护蒙德」是古恩希尔德家族的家训。每当驱动「神之眼」，我都会想起母亲、还有蒙德民众的期盼。为蒙德而战，为自由而战&mdash;&mdash;我，在所不辞。
|vo_07_01_tx_t       = 「永護蒙德」是古恩希爾德家族的家訓。每當驅動「神之眼」，我都會想起母親、還有蒙德民眾的期盼。為蒙德而戰，為自由而戰&mdash;&mdash;我，在所不辭。
|vo_07_01_rm_s       = "Yǒnghù Méngdé" shì Gǔ'ēnxī'ěrdé Jiāzú de jiāxùn. Měi dāng qūdòng "Shénzhīyǎn", wǒ dōuhuì xiǎngqǐ mǔqīn, háiyǒu Méngdé mínzhòng de qīpàn. Wèi Méngdé ér zhàn, wèi zìyóu ér zhàn&mdash;&mdash; wǒ, zàisuǒbùcí.
|vo_07_01_rm_t       = "Yǒnghù Méngdé" shì Gǔ'ēnxī'ěrdé Jiāzú de jiāxùn. Měi dāng qūdòng "Shénzhīyǎn", wǒ dōuhuì xiǎngqǐ mǔqīn, háiyǒu Méngdé mínzhòng de qípàn. Wèi Méngdé ér zhàn, wèi zìyóu ér zhàn&mdash;&mdash; wǒ, zàisuǒbùcí.
|vo_07_01_tl         = "To Eternally Protect Mondstadt" is the family precept of the [[Gunnhildr Clan]]. Every time I activate my "Vision," I always think of my mother, as well as the expectations of the people of Mondstadt. I will never hesitate to fight for Mondstadt, for freedom.

|vo_07_02_title_s    = 有什么想要分享…
|vo_07_02_title_t    = 有什麼想要分享…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx_s       = 我谨代表西风骑士团，向你为蒙德所做的一切致以谢意。还请你劳逸结合，量力而…怎么了，你突然笑了起来，我说了什么奇怪的话吗？
|vo_07_02_tx_t       = 我謹代表西風騎士團，向(你/妳)為蒙德所做的一切致以謝意。還請(你/妳)勞逸結合，量力而…怎麼了，(你/妳)突然笑了起來，我說了什麼奇怪的話嗎？
|vo_07_02_rm_s       = Wǒ jǐn dàibiǎo Xīfēng Qíshìtuán, xiàng nǐ wèi Méngdé suǒzuò de yīqiè zhìyǐ xièyì. Hái qǐngnǐ láoyì jiéhé, liànglì ér... Zěnmele, nǐ tūrán xiàole qǐlái, wǒ shuōle shénme qíguài de huà ma?
|vo_07_02_rm_t       = Wǒ jǐn dàibiǎo Xīfēng Qíshìtuán, xiàng nǐ wèi Méngdé suǒzuò de yīqiè zhìyǐ xièyì. Hái qǐngnǐ láoyì jiéhé, liànglì ér... Zěnmele, nǐ túrán xiàole qǐlái, wǒ shuōle shénme qíguài de huà ma?
|vo_07_02_tl         = On the solemn behalf of the Knights of Favonius, I thank you for all that you have done for Mondstadt. Please feel free to rest<ref group="TN •">{{Lang|mini=1|zh={{wt|勞逸結合#Chinese|劳逸结合}}|zh_rm=láoyì-jiéhé|zh_lit=work and leisure combined}}: an idiom that means to properly balance work and rest.</ref> and act according to your own capabi... What's wrong, you're laughing suddenly, did I say something wrong?

|vo_07_03_title_s    = 感兴趣的见闻…
|vo_07_03_title_t    = 感興趣的見聞…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx_s       = 「蒲公英，蒲公英，跟风一起，到远方去吧。」…它乘上风，说不定连天空岛都能飞到呢。
|vo_07_03_tx_t       = 「蒲公英，蒲公英，跟風一起，到遠方去吧。」…它乘上風，說不定連天空島都能飛到呢。
|vo_07_03_rm         = "Púgōngyīng, púgōngyīng, gēnfēng yīqǐ, dào yuǎnfāng qù ba." ...Tā chéng shàngfēng, shuōbudìng lián Tiānkōngdǎo dōu néng fēidào ne.
|vo_07_03_tl         = "Dandelion, dandelion, along with the wind, go to a distant place." ...Riding the wind, perhaps it can even fly all the way to [[Celestia]].

|vo_08_01_title_s    = 关于芭芭拉…
|vo_08_01_title_t    = 關於芭芭拉…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx_s       = 芭芭拉非常努力，只不过有时过于勉强自己…嗯？问我为什么了解得这么清楚？因为西风教会也归属骑士团管辖。
|vo_08_01_tx_t       = 芭芭拉非常努力，只不過有時過於勉強自己…嗯？問我為什麼瞭解得這麼清楚？因為西風教會也歸屬騎士團管轄。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Bābālā fēicháng nǔlì, zhǐbùguò yǒushí guòyú miǎnqiáng zìjǐ... Ǹg? Wèn wǒ wèishénme liǎojiě dé zhème qīngchǔ? Yīnwèi Xīfēng Jiàohuì yě guīshǔ Qíshìtuán guǎnxiá.
|vo_08_01_tl         = Barbara works very hard, but sometimes she pushes herself too much... Hmm? You're asking how I know this so well? It's because the Church of Favonius is also under the jurisdiction of the Knights.

|vo_08_02_title_s    = 关于丽莎…
|vo_08_02_title_t    = 關於麗莎…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx_s       = 丽莎，有她在的话，我会安心很多。
|vo_08_02_tx_t       = 麗莎，有她在的話，我會安心很多。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Lìshā, yǒu tā zài de huà, wǒ huì ānxīn hěnduō.
|vo_08_02_tl         = Lisa, if she's present, I feel much more at ease.

|vo_08_03_title_s    = 关于安柏…
|vo_08_03_title_t    = 關於安柏…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Amber]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Amber.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx_s       = 安柏这段时间确实有所成长。希望有朝一日，她的事迹也会被吟游诗人传颂。
|vo_08_03_tx_t       = 安柏這段時間確實有所成長。希望有朝一日，她的事蹟也會被吟遊詩人傳頌。
|vo_08_03_rm_s       = Ānbó zhèduàn shíjiān quèshí yǒusuǒ chéngzhǎng. Xīwàng yǒuzhāoyīrì, tā de shìjì yě huì bèi yínyóu-shīrén chuánsòng.
|vo_08_03_rm_t       = Ānbó zhèduàn shíjiān quèshí yǒusuǒ chéngzhǎng. Xīwàng yǒuzhāoyīrì, tā de shìjī yě huì bèi yínyóu-shīrén chuánsòng.
|vo_08_03_tl         = Amber has indeed grown a lot during this time. Hopefully there will come a day when her achievements will also be sung of and passed down by the bards.

|vo_08_04_title_s    = 关于凯亚…
|vo_08_04_title_t    = 關於凱亞…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Kaeya]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx_s       = 是吗…凯亚也向你提出建言了啊。他是一名优秀的西风骑士，这点毋庸置疑。
|vo_08_04_tx_t       = 是嗎…凱亞也向(你/妳)提出建言了啊。他是一名優秀的西風騎士，這點毋庸置疑。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Shìma... Kǎiyà yě xiàng nǐ tíchū jiànyánle a. Tā shì yīmíng yōuxiù de Xīfēng Qíshì, zhèdiǎn wúyōng zhìyí.
|vo_08_04_tl         = Is it so ... So Kaeya has also given you some advice. He is an excellent Knight of Favonius, this is indisputably true.

|vo_08_05_title_s    = 关于可莉…
|vo_08_05_title_t    = 關於可莉…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx_s       = 虽说玩乐是孩子的天性，但可莉中意的玩具却都是些危险品。让人难以放心。
|vo_08_05_tx_t       = 雖說玩樂是孩子的天性，但可莉中意的玩具卻都是些危險品。讓人難以放心。
|vo_08_05_rm_s       = Suīshuō wánlè shì háizi de tiānxìng, dàn Kělì zhòngyì de wánjù dōushì xiē wēixiánpǐn, ràng rén nányǐ fàngxīn.
|vo_08_05_rm_t       = Suīshuō wánlè shì háizi de tiānxìng, dàn Kělì zhòngyì de wánjù dōushì xiē wéixiánpǐn, ràng rén nányǐ fàngxīn.
|vo_08_05_tl         = Even though it is the nature of children to play, but the toys that Klee likes are all dangerous goods. It's quite hard to feel at ease.

|vo_08_06_title_s    = 关于阿贝多…
|vo_08_06_title_t    = 關於阿貝多…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx_s       = 「天才」这种名词，或许正是为了阿贝多这样的人准备的吧。
|vo_08_06_tx_t       = 「天才」這種名詞，或許正是為了阿貝多這樣的人準備的吧。
|vo_08_06_rm         = "Tiāncái" zhè zhǒng míngcí, huòxǔ zhèngshì wèile Ābèiduō zhèyàng de rén zhǔnbèi de ba.
|vo_08_06_tl         = Perhaps the word "talent" was prepared precisely for people like Albedo.

|vo_08_07_title_s    = 关于法尔伽…
|vo_08_07_title_t    = 關於法爾伽…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx_s       = 法尔伽大团长，他是西风骑士团的当代传奇。等到他凯旋归来的那一天，就请你亲自和他交谈吧。相信你也能从中受益。
|vo_08_07_tx_t       = 法爾伽大團長，他是西風騎士團的當代傳奇。等到他凱旋歸來的那一天，就請(你/妳)親自和他交談吧。相信(你/妳)也能從中受益。
|vo_08_07_rm_s       = Fǎ'ěrjiā Dà-tuánzhǎng, tā shì Xīfēng Qíshìtuán de dāngdài chuánqí. Děngdào tā kǎixuán guīlái de nàyītiān, jiù qǐngnǐ qīnzì hé tā jiāotán ba. Xiāngxìn nǐ yě néng cóngzhōng shòuyì.
|vo_08_07_rm_t       = Fǎ'ěrjiā Dà-tuánzhǎng, tā shì Xīfēng Qíshìtuán de dāngdài chuánqí. Děngdào tā kǎixuán guīlái de nàyītiān, jiù qǐngnǐ qīnzì hàn tā jiāotán ba. Xiāngxìn nǐ yě néng cóngzhōng shòuyì.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Grand Master Varka is a legendary figure within the current generation of the Knights of Favonius. When he makes his triumphant return, then you can talk to him personally. I believe you will have much to gain from this.

|vo_08_08_title_s    = 关于诺艾尔…
|vo_08_08_title_t    = 關於諾艾爾…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx_s       = 诺艾尔，嗯…那个努力想要成为西风骑士的少女。她的内心仍有软弱之处，现在这个阶段，也许还不适合让她接触外界的凶险。
|vo_08_08_tx_t       = 諾艾爾，嗯…那個努力想要成為西風騎士的少女。她的內心仍有軟弱之處，現在這個階段，也許還不適合讓她接觸外界的兇險。
|vo_08_08_rm         = Nuò'ài'ěr, ǹg... Nàgè nǔlì xiǎngyào chéngwéi Xīfēng Qíshì de shàonǚ. Tā de nèixīn réng yǒu ruǎnruò zhī chù, xiànzài zhège jiēduàn, yěxǔ hái bù shìhé ràng tā jiēchù wàijiè de xiōngxiǎn.
|vo_08_08_tl         = Noelle... Mmm, that young lady that works hard in order to become a Knight of Favonius. Her heart still has its weak corners. At the moment, it may not yet be the right time to allow her to experience the dangers of the outside world.

|vo_08_09_title_s    = 关于罗莎莉亚…
|vo_08_09_title_t    = 關於蘿莎莉亞…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Rosaria]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Rosaria.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx_s       = 罗莎莉亚修女总是把「麻烦」挂在嘴边，实际却十分称职。上次我和她说「如果觉得麻烦也可以找我帮忙」，她却回答「这样更麻烦」。嗯…我果然还有很多欠缺啊。
|vo_08_09_tx_t       = 蘿莎莉亞修女總是把「麻煩」掛在嘴邊，實際卻十分稱職。上次我和她說「如果覺得麻煩也可以找我幫忙」，她卻回答「這樣更麻煩」。嗯…我果然還有很多欠缺啊。
|vo_08_09_rm_s       = Luōshālìyà-xiūnǚ zǒng shì bǎ "máfan" guà zài zuǐbiān, shíjì què shífēn chènzhí. Shàngcì wǒ hé tā shuō "Rúguǒ juédé máfan yě kěyǐ zhǎo wǒ bāngmáng", tā què huídá "zhèyàng gèng máfan". Ǹg... Wǒ guǒrán hái yǒu hěnduō qiànquē a.
|vo_08_09_rm_t       = Luōshālìyà-xiūnǚ zǒng shì bǎ "máfan" guà zài zuǐbiān, shíjì què shífēn chèngzhí. Shàngcì wǒ hàn tā shuō "Rúguǒ juédé máfan yě kěyǐ zhǎo wǒ bāngmáng", tā què huídá "zhèyàng gèng máfan". Ǹg... Wǒ guǒrán hái yǒu hěnduō qiànquē a.
|vo_08_09_tl         = Sister Rosaria is quick to say something is "troublesome," but is actually very competent and responsible. Last time I said to her, "If you feel a matter is troublesome, you can also ask me to help," yet she replied me with "That would be even more troublesome." Mmm, it looks like I still have many shortcomings.

|vo_08_10_title_s    = 关于迪卢克・愧欠
|vo_08_10_title_t    = 關於迪盧克・愧歉
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Diluc]]: Disillusion
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc - Disillusion.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx_s       = 迪卢克前辈对骑士团的指摘事出有因，即使心中愧疚也无法改变既定的结果…我只想通过我的努力，让他对骑士团有所改观…嗯，这是我的责任。
|vo_08_10_tx_t       = 迪盧克前輩對騎士團的指摘事出有因，即使心中愧疚也無法改變既定的結果…我只想通過我的努力，讓他對騎士團有所改觀…嗯，這是我的責任。
|vo_08_10_rm         = Dílúkè-qiánbèi duì Qíshìtuán de zhǐzhāi shìchūyǒuyīn, jíshǐ xīnzhōng kuìjiù yě wúfǎ gǎibiàn jìdìng de jiéguǒ... Wǒ zhǐxiǎng tōngguò wǒ de nǔlì, ràng tā duì Qíshìtuán yǒu suǒ gǎiguān... Ǹg, zhèshì wǒ de zérèn.
|vo_08_10_tl         = Senior Diluc's criticisms of the Knights are not without reason. Even if the guilt and regret within my heart cannot change the results that were already set... I just want to make him have a change of opinion towards the Knights through my hard work... Mmm, this is my responsibility.

|vo_08_11_title_s    = 关于迪卢克・敬重
|vo_08_11_title_t    = 關於迪盧克・敬重
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About Diluc: Respect
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc - Respect.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx_s       = 迪卢克…是一位非常可敬的前辈。虽然我们选择的道路不同，但这份共通的守护蒙德的心意，我能感受得到。
|vo_08_11_tx_t       = 迪盧克…是一位非常可敬的前輩。雖然我們選擇的道路不同，但這份共通的守護蒙德的心意，我能感受得到。
|vo_08_11_rm         = Dílúkè... shì yīwèi fēicháng kějìng de qiánbèi. Suīrán wǒmen xuǎnzé de dàolù bùtóng, dàn zhè fèn gòngtōng de shǒuhù Méngdé de xīnyì, wǒ néng gǎnshòu dédào.
|vo_08_11_tl         = Diluc... is a very respectable senior. Even though the paths we chose are different, but I can feel the intentions we both share of protecting Mondstadt.

|vo_08_12_title_s    = 关于砂糖…
|vo_08_12_title_t    = 關於砂糖…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Sucrose]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sucrose.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx_s       = 作为炼金术士，砂糖也算天赋异禀。况且她的身边还有阿贝多指点，未来应该不用担心。只是…不，没什么，沉浸在自己的世界里，也不算坏事吧。
|vo_08_12_tx_t       = 作為煉金術士，砂糖也算天賦異稟。況且她的身邊還有阿貝多指點，未來應該不用擔心。只是…不，沒什麼，沉浸在自己的世界裡，也不算壞事吧。
|vo_08_12_rm         = Zuòwéi liànjīnshù-shì, Shātáng yě suàn tiānfù yìbǐng. Kuàngqiě tā de shēnbiān hái yǒu Ābèiduō zhǐdiǎn, wèilái yīnggāi bùyòng dānxīn. Zhǐshì... Bù, méishénme, chénjìn zài zìjǐ de shìjiè lǐ, yě bùsuàn huàishì ba.
|vo_08_12_tl         = As an alchemist, Sucrose can also be said to be gifted with extraordinary talent. She even has Albedo beside her as a guide, so she probably doesn't need to be worried about in the future. It's just that... No, it's nothing, I suppose being immersed in one's own world isn't such a bad thing.

|vo_08_13_title_s    = 关于优菈…
|vo_08_13_title_t    = 關於優菈…
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Eula]]
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Eula.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx_s       = 优菈？咳…请不要对她的身世耿耿于怀，西风骑士会公正地评价每个人。优菈明辨是非，才华出众，偶尔发表危险言论，也只是她的性格使然。哪怕她总是说要挑战我，我也不介意。
|vo_08_13_tx_t       = 優菈？咳…請不要對她的身世耿耿於懷，西風騎士會公正地評價每個人。優菈明辨是非、才華出眾，偶爾發表危險言論也只是她的性格使然。哪怕她總是說要挑戰我，我也不介意。
|vo_08_13_rm         = Yōulā? Kè... Qǐng bùyào duì tā de shēnshì gěnggěngyúhuái, Xīfēng Qíshì huì gōngzhèng de píngjià měigèrén. Yōulā míngbiànshìfēi, cáihuá chūzhòng, ǒu'ěr fābiǎo wéixiǎn yánlùn, yě zhǐshì tā dì xìnggé shǐrán. Nǎpà tā zǒng shì shuō yào tiǎozhàn wǒ, wǒ yě bù jièyì.
|vo_08_13_tl         = Eula? Ahem... Please don't take her unfortunate heritage to heart, the Knights of Favonius will judge everyone fairly. Eula has a clear sense of discernment for right and wrong, and possesses outstanding talent, the dangerous statements she occasionally expresses are simply due to her personality. Even if she constantly says she wants to challenge me. I also don't mind.

|vo_09_01_title_s    = 想要了解琴・其一
|vo_09_01_title_t    = 想要瞭解琴・其一
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx_s       = 我肩负着西风骑士团的信任，还有蒙德民众的期待。为此，我不能松懈。
|vo_09_01_tx_t       = 我肩負著西風騎士團的信任，還有蒙德民眾的期待。為此，我不能鬆懈。
|vo_09_01_rm_s       = Wǒ jiānfùzhe Xīfēng Qíshìtuán de xìnrèn, háiyǒu Méngdé mínzhòng de qīdài. Wèicǐ, wǒ bùnéng sōngxiè.
|vo_09_01_rm_t       = Wǒ jiānfùzhe Xīfēng Qíshìtuán de xìnrèn, háiyǒu Méngdé mínzhòng de qídài. Wèicǐ, wǒ bùnéng sōngxiè.
|vo_09_01_tl         = I shoulder the trust of the Knights of Favonius, as well as the expectations of the people of Mondstadt. Because of this, I cannot slack off.

|vo_09_02_title_s    = 想要了解琴・其二
|vo_09_02_title_t    = 想要瞭解琴・其二
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx_s       = 温妮莎的「蒲公英骑士」之名传承至今，曾经有无数伟大的骑士获授这一荣誉。我不能辱没这个名字。因此，决不能松懈。要成为守护众人的坚盾与利剑。
|vo_09_02_tx_t       = 溫妮莎的「蒲公英騎士」之名傳承至今，曾經有無數偉大的騎士獲授這一榮譽。我不能辱沒這個名字。因此，絕不能鬆懈。要成為守護眾人的堅盾與利劍。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Wēnnīshā de "Púgōngyīng Qíshì" zhī míng chuánchéng zhìjīn, céngjīng yǒu wúshù wěidà de Qíshì huòshòu zhè yī róngyù. Wǒ bùnéng rǔmò zhège míngzì. Yīncǐ, jué bùnéng sōngxiè. Yào chéngwéi shǒuhù zhòngrén de jiāndùn yǔ lìjiàn.
|vo_09_02_tl         = [[Vennessa]]'s title of the "Dandelion Knight" has been passed on until today, and there have been countless great Knights that were once conferred this honor. I cannot bring disgrace to this name. For this, I cannot slack off. I must become the steadfast shield and the sharpened sword that protects everyone.

|vo_09_03_title_s    = 想要了解琴・其三
|vo_09_03_title_t    = 想要瞭解琴・其三
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx_s       = 无论是传奇故事还是史书，都只记载了伟大骑士的功绩。难道，他们一次也不曾迷失过吗…？<br />风啊，请指引我前进的道路。
|vo_09_03_tx_t       = 無論是傳奇故事還是史書，都只記載了偉大騎士的功績。難道，他們一次也不曾迷失過嗎…？<br />風啊，請指引我前進的道路。
|vo_09_03_rm_s       = Wúlùn shì chuánqí gùshì háishì shǐshū, dōu zhǐ jìzǎile wěidà Qíshì de gōngjì. Nándào, tāmen yīcì yě bùcéng míshīguò ma...?<br />Fēng a, qǐng zhǐyǐn wǒ qiánjìn de dàolù.
|vo_09_03_rm_t       = Wúlùn shì chuánqí gùshì háishì shǐshū, dōu zhǐ jìzǎile wěidà Qíshì de gōngjī. Nándào, tāmen yīcì yě bùcéng míshīguò ma...?<br />Fēng a, qǐng zhǐyǐn wǒ qiánjìn de dàolù.
|vo_09_03_tl         = Whether in the legendary stories or history books, only the achievements and merits of past great Knights are recorded. Could it be that they never once wavered in their path...?<br />Oh, wind, please guide my way forward.

|vo_09_04_title_s    = 想要了解琴・其四
|vo_09_04_title_t    = 想要瞭解琴・其四
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx_s       = 全身心投入工作的时候，烦恼和时间会一并被忘却。「你是最适合做这种事情的人选。」…那个时候，大团长法尔伽就是这样对我说的。
|vo_09_04_tx_t       = 全身心投入工作的時候，煩惱和時間會一併被忘卻。「妳是最適合做這種事情的人選。」…那個時候，大團長法爾伽就是這樣對我說的。
|vo_09_04_rm_s       = Quán shēnxīn tóurù gōngzuò de shíhòu, fánnǎo hé shíjiān huì yībìng bèi wàngquè. "Nǐ shì zuì shìhé zuò zhèzhǒng shìqíng de rénxuǎn." ...Nàgè shíhòu, Dà-tuánzháng Fǎ'ěrjiā jiùshì zhèyàng duì wǒ shuō de.
|vo_09_04_rm_t       = Quán shēnxīn tóurù gōngzuò de shíhòu, fánnǎo hàn shíjiān huì yībìng bèi wàngquè. "Nǐ shì zuì shìhé zuò zhèzhǒng shìqíng de rénxuǎn." ...Nàgè shíhòu, Dà-tuánzháng Fǎ'ěrjiā jiùshì zhèyàng duì wǒ shuō de.
|vo_09_04_tl         = When I'm wholeheartedly invested in my work, I forget all about time and my worries. "You are the most suitable person to do this sort of task." ...This is what Grand Master Varka said to me at the time.

|vo_09_05_title_s    = 想要了解琴・其五
|vo_09_05_title_t    = 想要瞭解琴・其五
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx_s       = 与你同行时，前进的道路变得无比清晰。就好像，终于有人能依靠，这究竟是…<br />不，一定是我还不够努力。绝对不能松懈，不能辜负西风骑士团和蒙德…但是，谢谢你。
|vo_09_05_tx_t       = 與(你/妳)同行時，前進的道路變得無比清晰。就好像，終於有人能依靠，這究竟是…<br />不，一定是我還不夠努力。絕對不能鬆懈，不能辜負西風騎士團和蒙德…但是，謝謝(你/妳)。
|vo_09_05_rm_s       = Yǔ nǐ tóngxíng shí, qiánjìn de dàolù biàn dé wúbǐ qīngxī. Jiù hǎoxiàng, zhōngyú yǒurén néng yīkào, zhè jiūjìng shì...<br />Bù, yīdìng shì wǒ hái bùgòu nǔlì. Juéduì bùnéng sōngxiè, bùnéng gūfù Xīfēng Qíshìtuán hé Méngdé... Dànshì, xièxiè nǐ.
|vo_09_05_rm_t       = Yǔ nǐ tóngxíng shí, qiánjìn de dàolù biàn dé wúbǐ qīngxī. Jiù hǎoxiàng, zhōngyú yǒurén néng yīkào, zhè jiùjìng shì...<br />Bù, yīdìng shì wǒ hái bùgòu nǔlì. Juéduì bùnéng sōngxiè, bùnéng gūfù Xīfēng Qíshìtuán hàn Méngdé... Dànshì, xièxiè nǐ.
|vo_09_05_tl         = When I'm journeying together with you, the path forward feels so clear. It's as if there's finally someone I can rely on, is this... No, it must be that I haven't worked hard enough. I mustn't slack off, I can't let down the Knights of Favonius and Mondstadt... Even so, thank you.

|vo_10_01_tx_s       = 或许可以和你聊聊书上那些英雄传记。嗯，你听说过「坎瑞亚英雄王」的故事吗？
|vo_10_01_tx_t       = 或許可以和(你/妳)聊聊書上那些英雄傳記。嗯，(你/妳)聽說過「坎瑞亞英雄王」的故事嗎？
|vo_10_01_rm_s       = Huòxǔ kěyǐ hé nǐ liáoliáo shūshàng nàxiē yīngxióng zhuànjì. Ǹg, nǐ tīngshuōguò "Kǎnruìyǎ Yīngxióng Wáng" de gùshì ma?
|vo_10_01_rm_t       = Huòxǔ kěyǐ hàn nǐ liáoliáo shūshàng nàxiē yīngxióng zhuànjì. Ǹg, nǐ tīngshuōguò "Kǎnruìyǎ Yīngxióng Wáng" de gùshì ma?
|vo_10_01_tl         = Perhaps I can have a chat with you about the biographies of heroes in the books. Mmm, have you heard the story of "The Hero-King of [[Khaenri'ah]]"?

|vo_10_02_tx_t       = 假如有什麼神奇的藥劑，喝了就不需要睡覺…嗯，要不明天問問麗莎吧？

|vo_10_02_tl         = If only there was a wondrous potion that allows its drinker to never need sleep... Hmm, perhaps [I'll] ask Lisa about this tomorrow?

|vo_12_01_title_s    = 生日…
|vo_12_01_title_t    = 生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx_s       = 今天是值得庆祝的日子。要说为何的话，因为这是受风护佑的你，诞生的日子啊。既然是生日，那就好好休息一下吧。<br />咳咳…祝你生日快乐…<br />啊，请原谅我的冒昧。不知这份礼物，是否能令你满意呢？
|vo_12_01_tx_t       = 今天是值得慶祝的日子。要說為何的話，因為這是受風護佑的(你/妳)，誕生的日子啊。既然是生日，那就好好休息一下吧。<br />咳咳…祝(你/妳)生日快樂…<br />啊，請原諒我的冒昧。不知這份禮物，是否能令(你/妳)滿意呢？
|vo_12_01_rm_s       = Jīntiān shì zhídé qìngzhù de rìzi. Yàoshuō wèihé dehuà, yīnwèi zhè shì shòufēng hùyòu de nǐ, dànshēng de rìzi a. Jìrán shì shēngrì, nà jiù hǎohǎo xiūxi yīxià ba.<br />Kèke... Zhù nǐ shēngrì kuàilè...<br />A, qǐng yuánliàng wǒ de màomèi. Bùzhī zhèfèn lǐwù, shìfǒu néng lìng nǐ mǎnyì ne?
|vo_12_01_rm_t       = Jīntiān shì zhídé qìngzhù de rìzi. Yàoshuō wèihé dehuà, yīnwèi zhè shì shòufēng hùyòu de nǐ, dànshēng de rìzi a. Jìrán shì shēngrì, nà jiù hǎohǎo xiūxí yīxià ba.<br />Kèke... Zhù nǐ shēngrì kuàilè...<br />A, qǐng yuánliàng wǒ de màomèi. Bùzhī zhèfèn lǐwù, shìfǒu néng lìng nǐ mǎnyì ne?
|vo_12_01_tl         = Today is a day worth celebrating. As for the reason, it is the day you, who are blessed and protected by the wind, were born. Since it's your birthday, let us rest properly for a while.<br />Ahem... Happy birthday to you...<br />Ah, please forgive my acting rashly. I wonder if you can be satisfied with this gift?

|vo_13_02_tx_s       = 只要风不停歇，我就不会停下脚步。
|vo_13_02_tx_t       = 只要風不停歇，我就不會停下腳步。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Zhǐyào fēng bù tíngxiē, wǒ jiù bùhuì tíng xià jiǎobù.
|vo_13_02_tl         = As long as the wind doesn't rest, I will also never cease my footsteps.

|vo_13_03_title_s    = 突破的感受・转
|vo_13_03_title_t    = 突破的感受・轉
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx_s       = 就算暂时获得了平静，也不能掉以轻心。身为代理团长，我必须未雨绸缪。
|vo_13_03_tx_t       = 就算暫時獲得了平靜，也不能掉以輕心。身為代理團長，我必須未雨綢繆。
|vo_13_03_rm_s       = Jiùsuàn zànshí huòdele píngjìng, yě bùnéng diàoyǐqīngxīn. Shēnwèi Dàilǐ Tuánzhǎng, wǒ bìxū wèiyǔ-chóumóu.
|vo_13_03_rm_t       = Jiùsuàn zhànshí huòdele píngjìng, yě bùnéng diàoyǐqīngxīn. Shēnwèi Dàilǐ Tuánzhǎng, wǒ bìxū wèiyǔ-chóumóu.
|vo_13_03_tl         = Even if peace has temporarily been achieved, [we] also musn't lower our guard. As the Acting Grand Master, I need to plan ahead.<ref group="TN •">{{Lang|mini=1|zh={{wt|未雨綢繆#Chinese|未雨绸缪}}|zh_rm=wèiyǔ-chóumóu|zh_lit=to repair the roof before it rains}}: an idiom that means to prepare for a rainy day or to take the necessary precautions.</ref>

|vo_13_04_title_s    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_title_t    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx_s       = 我做得还不够好。自从与你相遇，一直承蒙你的关照。这份感激…<br />风啊，请容许我的私心。并非作为代理团长，只是作为「琴」，在此起誓&mdash;&mdash;我的剑将与你同在。
|vo_13_04_tx_t       = 我做得還不夠好。自從與(你/妳)相遇，一直承蒙(你/妳)的關照。這份感激…<br />風啊，請容許我的私心。並非作為代理團長，只是作為「琴」，在此起誓&mdash;&mdash;我的劍將與(你/妳)同在。
|vo_13_04_rm         = Wǒ zuòde hái bùgòu hǎo. Zìcóng yǔ nǐ xiāngyù, yīzhí chéngméng nǐ de guānzhào. Zhè fèn gǎnjī...<br />Fēng a, qǐng róngxǔ wǒ de sīxīn. Bìngfēi zuòwéi Dàilǐ Tuánzhǎng, zhǐshì zuòwéi "Qín", zàicǐ qǐshì&mdash;&mdash; wǒ de jiàn jiāng yǔnǐ tóngzài.
|vo_13_04_tl         = What I've done is still not good enough. Ever since we met, I have been indebted to you for your care. This gratitude...<br />Oh, wind, please forgive my selfishness. Not as the Acting Grand Master, but simply as "Jean," I swear to you here and now&mdash;&mdash; my sword will always be with you.
}}
